post.author: HansGrosse63
post.body:
Is it in any way possible to extract the .md5r model of Hans so that I can get an editable mesh of him in 3DsMax?

Or is the mesh data even stored in the md5r?

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body:
HansGrosse63 wrote:
Is it in any way possible to extract the .md5r model of Hans so that I can get an editable mesh of him in 3DsMax?

Or is the mesh data even stored in the md5r?

Of course u can. But not directly.
Check Pm

post.author: TonyStalker
post.body:
Sorry to reply on this old post, but can someone please send me plugin (max 9, maya 8.5; 2011 and milkshape3d) or show me the way to import md5r file for editing.
Sorry for my english. Cheers

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body: md5b/md5r can be imported... There is a tool somewhere. I used it a few years ago for testing.

post.author: TonyStalker
post.body: i know there must be a tool somewhere, i have spend several hours finding it without success. i think this is only place where i can ask for help.

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body:
If i am not wrong, 3d object converter allowed to import md5b (md5 binary) models (Etqw and Wolf09 uses them in mp). You can't release those models ofc.
Check it out if it works.

But still cannot find the tools. I remember that I imported the Tesla Gun to Doom 3 for testing purposses (just like many other models, but finally deleted them from hdd, to don't break the rulesss).

_____________________________________________________
edit: Searched in the interwebs and... quite funny that it is for Gmod...
http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=78797

ohhh and the lovely Mite-Crab
http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=108822

At least they credited the authors in the Mite one.
_____________________________________________________
